page.title: 11Pre-School Education
page.content: Two{playgroups}are based in Bourton- on-the-Water. One of them uses the {Youth Centre}and is open each weekday morning between 9.30 and 12 noon. It is run as a private business. The other group uses the{Baptist Church {Rooms}and is open at the same times on Monday, Thursday and Friday. It is run on a community basis with parents committing themselves as helpers. Gloucestershire provides{no pre-school {education}so each group caters for {children of ages 3 to 5,}approximately 70 children per week in all. Schoolchildren from{Bourton Vale {Secondary School}are welcomed into each of these groups as helpers. There is a{Mother and Toddler}group in Bourton catering for 12 children of ages 3 months to 3 years on Thursdays from 2-4pm. A similar group is being formed in Little Rissington.
